alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Jackson; Overton; Putnam; Smith; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 1:04AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Overton, southeastern Smith, central De Kalb, southern Jackson, northern White and Putnam Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 104 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Carthage to near Smithville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cookeville, Sparta, Smithville, Carthage, Gainesboro, Algood, Baxter, Gordonsville, Hickman, South Carthage, Dowelltown, Liberty, Hamptons Crossroads, Bakers Crossroads, Burgess Falls State Park, Rickman, Center Hill Lake, Granville, Edgar Evans State Park and Cummins Falls State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 255 and 297. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: De Kalb; Jackson; Overton; Putnam; Smith; White
